findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose the parties to financial risks without protection against third-party claims.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limitation of liability clauses are critical in contracts; the absence of limits may lead to unlimited financial exposure.
findings.evidence_quote: No event shall be limited by the limitation of liability clause.

findings.rationale: The lack of audit rights may prevent one party from verifying compliance or misuse of confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of intellectual property provisions may lead to disputes over ownership and use of innovations or ideas.
